website_summaries.verdict: This CC cream combines an anti-aging moisturizer and sheer foundation in one product. Made by a skincare brand that has delivered results for generations.
pros: Offers seven skin-loving benefits with moisturizers and a hint of foundation
Firms, evens out tone and texture, corrects dullness, minimizes lines and pores, and hydrates
Doesn't contain oil yet goes on smoothly
Easy to blend and wears well
cons: No SPF so won't replace sunscreen
Shades are fairly dark on pale skin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am 76 years old and started using this in my 50/ 60's before I found the touch of foundation. I use the regular at bedtime and the touch of foundation in the daytime. Many people have remarked that I have no wrinkles. Whatever is in this product makes my skin look wonderful. I also noticed this on my daughter's dresser. She is very wealthy and can afford to buy any beauty care products, but this is the only face cream that I see on her dresser! I guess I set a good example!
customer_reviews.author: Carol G.

customer_reviews.title: To dark
customer_reviews.text: Cannot wear this at all. It's pretty dark, maybe more for tanned skin but it is not for light or fair skin
customer_reviews.author: scwheeler

customer_reviews.title: Should have SPF!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, it is light and goes on smoothly, but have two complaints: 1) Way too much comes out from the pump so you have to barely touch it to get the right amount. 2) This has no SPF and I just believe every foundation and/or moisturizer should have at least SPF 30.
customer_reviews.author: MissMare

customer_reviews.title: A waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I wasted my money. I prefer Olay products but this deserves 0 stars. It did not absorb but sat on my skin in a dark film. I am 63 and have a fair complexion. There were no choices in shades of the touch of foundation. The color was for medium to dark skin with yellow undertones. My face looked sallow, with an uneven skin tone and every freckle/age spot looked darker and more obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the moisturizer with a touch of foundation. I got just the moisturizer. Unfortunately, I opened it and was surprised to see it was white, no foundation color. I have used the Olay CC Tone Correction for years and that is what I ordered. It was a different different dispenser so I thought it had just changed appearance. Needless to say, I have opened the container and will therefore have to keep it, but I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pat S

customer_reviews.title: This is not sheer.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this product but it is not the same. It claims to be a touch of foundation, not true. It is way too dark and heavy. I have a fair complexion and had to add moisturizer to it in order to smooth it out. Then I had to use a cotton pad to wipe some color off. My Hispanic friend could use this and I gave all of the product to her.
customer_reviews.author: JDZdesigns

customer_reviews.title: Simply spectacular 🙂
customer_reviews.text: This cream is absolutely good in all its presentations, leaves your hydrated face full of life, I would recommend to all women.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Castillo

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: i don't like it, it broke me out badly. I don't break out but I've been using olay face wash for a while now and I'm fine, but after I use this moisturizer, I broke out badly all over my chin to my cheeks. It was horrible, never buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nkaujzoo

customer_reviews.title: Light, moisturizing good coverage of basic imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: No longer use any other foundation except this for the past 5 years. moisturizing AND provides good imperfections coverage.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Foundation/moisturizer combination
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years during the summer months. I like that it is non greasy and lightweight. great for warm temperatures. It gives a subtle coverage- evening out skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good CC cream
customer_reviews.text: I really like this moisturizer. It gives just the right amount of coverage if you are looking for something sheer. I top it off with some powder to set it and for a tad more coverage. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tuffy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I can’t find it in local stores. It works so well as a moisturizer and light foundation. I don’t like heavy makeup , so it’s great for me. It’sa perfect match
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Needed something quick on the go. Looks dark at first, but it great. I have very fair skin and no orange.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Sempek

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product I am used to
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this at Walmart many times, but this item broke me out and this is probably the only item I have ever bought off Amazon that I have had a bad experience with or suspected was not the real deal. It does look nice as a light foundation and is moisturizing and IF your skin is not prone to breakouts it might be ok for you to purchase. That's the only reason I am giving this three stars. If you are looking for the exact product from Walmart you may be disappointed. If it's not fake, I must have gotten an old or contaminated bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: Like the smoothness and light weight; foundation is very light also; doesn't streak or rub off easily. Have used for several months; will not use any other.
customer_reviews.author: j. wells

customer_reviews.title: Love most of Olay products - this was a tone off from what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The color that this product has is too much brown or a darker beige than I like. I didn't see any place to request a lighter tone, and thought it would be OK. Too dark for me, but will use it on my hands and arms to cover any age spots.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually wear foundation but I like this cause it’s easy to put on, has a little color, and doesn’t feel caked on.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Patrico

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all kinds of face moisturizers and foundations and I always go back to Olay! Started using this product for the first time because I was looking for a god tinted moisturizer because I hate wearing make up and I love it!!! I even use it as a base when I do wear foundation and i only need a small amount of my foundation and it looks great! I love anything that makes me look younger
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent moisturizer with a tint of make up.... always what I grab when in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: lkjeseth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tinted Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Product goes on sheer but does provide some coverage. Color looks natural on my skin tone (fair, red undertones). I do have some fine lines and some acne scarring - it did not make these things look worse. The scent was a bit strong initially for me, but it went away quickly and I haven't noticed it throughout the day. My skin does not feel greasy or slimy. I think I will be incorporating this into my normal routine.
customer_reviews.author: Carrieann Sanfilippo

customer_reviews.title: Not too dark afterall !!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but I have to admit I was stunned by the dark color, BUT, as it turns turns out, once applied and with a tissue wipe off of extra, the color was not all that dark. Love how it moisturizes for daytime use.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Russo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my age(75)
customer_reviews.text: Less is more at my age. It has just enough color and is a great product for dry skin. Much better than expensive tinted moisture brands. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this for herself and has been using this product for awhile. She won't use anything else. The product arrived fast, was as described/expected and is being used regularly. She'll be ordering more when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels so good
customer_reviews.text: My face enjoys this product very much. I think you should try it. You will not be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jo Cloud

customer_reviews.title: It has nice translucent coverage and I think it would probably work ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking for a new tinted moisturizer that doesn't contain sunscreen and decided to try this. It has nice translucent coverage and I think it would probably work for a variety of skin tones. Unfortunately, my skin is somewhat sensitive and this product just isn't going to work for me. I still gave it three stars though, because I think it had a lot of good qualities and could work well for other people.
customer_reviews.author: Oregonme

customer_reviews.title: Olay is wonderful, but this breaks me out
customer_reviews.text: I have used Olay products for years. I did not realize that I ordered a different product with foundation in it. My skin reacts to something in this product. I had to give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Musicplayer10

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Olay brand and this product is no exception. Great moisturizer with a creamy consistency. Not light or too heavy. The tint is just the right amount. I don’t use foundation now; just this moisturizer and some powder.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cream and started using immediately. It did not give me rash or any "skin bumps", but my face starts tingling every time I use it. I got the cream color but the outcome was not cream at all, after application my face had a yellow/brownish tint to it. I tried to use lighter powder to mask it, but the color would shine through the powder. Anyhow, I already opened it and used so I will not be returning it. Olay is a good product it just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: O. Mira

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I normally use the Olay Total Effects Moisturizer, but I opted for the Olay CC Cream instead. Essentially it is the same product except this has foundation in it. It seems to work fine but I've decided I would rather keep my moisturizer and foundation seperate because there are some days when I don't want to wear makeup after showering. The fact that this has some foundation in it makes me feel like I need to clean my face. Nothing wrong with it though, I would still recommend it to someone who wants a "all-in-one" product. Olay always delivers and this is a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tell it’s tinted
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and you can’t tell it’s tinted after you put it on. Like the scent as well but think I’ll stick with the regular non tinted one. Feel like it’s better as a moisturizer overall.
customer_reviews.author: rnujlus

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is very dark color not touch of color.
customer_reviews.text: Should have listen to reviews very dark color not the product I bought before. It’s a shame because the product is nice but why it changed?
customer_reviews.author: Sue Latham

customer_reviews.title: I missed you Olay!
customer_reviews.text: I used olay for many years but for a change I switched to an organic cream for 2 weeks & every time is used it I missed Olay... No cream can replace Olay. I felt Olay with a touch of foundation is new improved product ... something has changed for good. It’s light, not oily, not too creamy... it’s a perfect blend of moisturizer & foundation!! I love you Olay! Also it’s lovely fragrance!!
customer_reviews.author: Peace@7

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: love this lotion and a plus with a hint of foundation gives my face a nice smooth look and feel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: definitely not for all shades of skin
customer_reviews.text: terrible...threw it in trash....very greasy...and color not for all....don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Use if you have untinted Total Effects on hand
customer_reviews.text: Has as much color as foundation. However, all of Total Effects line works well to prevent wrinkles and aging skin.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: These socks are way to tight around my calves- and my calves are not big! I prefer more cushion in the heel area as well. They seem to be holding up well but I purchased different socks because of the tightness.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Other products might be better for a pale skin.
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is the lightest shade they make, it is still too dark for us pale skinned blonds. And we’re the ones that need protection most!
customer_reviews.author: connie edwards

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Goes on more like a foundation than a moisturizer. Has a very distinct olay smell. Not good or bad, just that grandma smell. The design of the bottle also ends up getting a mess all over the clear cap. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but not for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this, and it will probably be perfect for me in the summer. However, it is definitely too dark for my skin right now. It does seem to have a more orangey undertone, and it definitely seems like there is more than just a touch of foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cady

customer_reviews.title: Thick.
customer_reviews.text: I like Olay and bought this product previously and it wasn't as thick as this container. Will have to apply with a little water and sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Clearview

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Don’t wear much make up and it is perfect to even out skin while staying natural looking. Smells good, feels good.
customer_reviews.author: luvreading

customer_reviews.title: Allergy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a loyal buyer of the normal Olay moisturizer, ordered this one without noticing it had a touch of foundation. I was surprised to learn about the foundation touch in it when I got it but figured I would give it a try thinking might be better than the regular one. I got an allergic reaction around my lip/under the nose area. Will stop using this. I don’t even think I have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Martinez

customer_reviews.title: perfect for summer
customer_reviews.text: A lovely product that "does it all". Perfect for summer; great to not have to layer multiple products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: so not as great for winter
customer_reviews.text: It is lighter than the previous version... so not as great for winter, when skin needs a little more moisture... but, one plus of the newer version - a lighter scent! Wish the ingredients were more natural. Solid 4/5, though
customer_reviews.author: Cammyd

customer_reviews.title: Good. As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have oily, acne prone skin. This provides light coverage that moisturizers and doesn't make my face feel greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great light makeup
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup. Is lightweight but has color and some coverage. Perfect for hot summer days. And will take me into fall and winter with a darker blush
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have tried this product. I have light skin and was a little unsure after reading some other reviews but decided to give it a try. Don't panic the first time you try it. The first "squirt" from the bottle was definitely darker than the next ones. Don't use too much - a little is plenty. It blends really well and just leaves a little glow. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Holt

customer_reviews.title: I don't like wearing make up
customer_reviews.text: I don't like wearing make up, but in the winter I need something to keep from looking like a ghost. This adds the tiny color I need, AND it is a moisturizer so my face doesn't feel dry. I've been using it for years
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what is in it but it hurt my face so bad. It was also really streaky and cakey
customer_reviews.text: This made my face burn and itch, I don't know what is in it but it hurt my face so bad. It was also really streaky and cakey. Just all together I was extremely disappointed in this product because Olay usually has a wonderful skin care line.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Just right light and with tint perfect for morning rush
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lasater

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foundation I've ever used. I do have to put a moisturizer on first because my skin tends to be too dry if I don't. But I like this make-up because it goes on easy and stays put. Everyone has different skin issues so I wouldn't expect this to work for everyone. I do wish it covered my age spots better but it does hide them for the most part. Would recommend to anyone. Written by LOregon (spouse purchased).
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The cream is great and light product, I’m using it since 2009 with great results. Note that similar brand products are available in other countries but different quality.
customer_reviews.author: SHAREEF ALMUBARAK

customer_reviews.title: Works for my skin tone
customer_reviews.text: The sent is a little strong but wears off quickly. I'm of Filipino and Chinese ancestry and the color works well for me. Not sure it would work well with super fair skin. Moisturizer wise in not sure since its the top layer of serum, sunscreen/moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Myeyesmyworld

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This has a touch of foundation which is just enough coverage to cover minor discolorations on your face. I put it on with a sponge although fingers work very well, too.
customer_reviews.author: dolores3b

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: When I put this on, it is as if I put nothing on. It doesn't do a thing for my face. It doesn't cover up redness, marks, etc, nothing! It is a huge disappointment. .
customer_reviews.author: Colleen P.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing, light and talc free. Absolutely love it and shipping was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Scent bothers me
customer_reviews.text: I love this, and it made my skin look very nice. So, if you are not sensitive, go for it. I am super sensitive, and the smell gave me a headache, and I can feel little tingles/stings on my face, and my instinct was to wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: vfc13gooch

customer_reviews.title: soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my makeup . I only used it 1 so far but I like it
customer_reviews.author: Rzsbaby

customer_reviews.title: I love the tint, it looks like I'm wearing makeup, but without the extra effort.
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I discover this before??? I have very sensitive skin and even more sensitive eyes. Anything with too much fragrance and/or sunscreen burns my skin, but worse, makes my eyes burn eventually causing an eyeball oriented headache. So I found this product and guess what? It has a bit of a 'tint' so it looks like I'm wearing makeup!! I Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Sunluvr

customer_reviews.title: Great for Au Natural days!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my lazy au natural days. Helps cover some redness and blemish marks while getting the advantages of a face cream. I always forget to use my night cream so this really helps me out. I'm a medium golden complexion and I've had no issues with it blending in. Got my mom one too and she's super pale. We both love it
customer_reviews.author: LToomey

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shade, moisturizing but not greasy, doesn't clog pores. Nice coverage without looking cakey. Wonderful for mature skin, doesn't settle into lines.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice moisturizer and subtle. use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: parissa38

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It has been my favorite for a while, but not very satisfied with the moisturizing lately
customer_reviews.author: Evette

customer_reviews.title: I could become a professional spokesperson for this product!
customer_reviews.text: Mark my words:.....this is one of the BEST foundations I have EVER used...69 years old...I have either bought it for relatives or recommended it to 100 people....young...old...ANY skin type/color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It feels sticky in couple of hours and your face looks worse than normal (as it catches dirt )
customer_reviews.text: Does not do a single thing out of 7 it claims. forget anything else, it does not even moisturize properly, you can that 'white thing' on your face and your skin does not absorb it. It feels sticky in couple of hours and your face looks worse than normal (as it catches dirt ). I strongly NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: best
customer_reviews.text: the best, does not bother senesetive skin and no scent and nor greasey
customer_reviews.author: four lads

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Light
customer_reviews.text: I've used the version with a touch of tanner before but this was my first time trying the touch of foundation version. Love it! Light, sheer coverage with the added benefit of nourishing skin. Winner!
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but no SPF?
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product because I thought it had an SPF. Otherwise, I like the color (fair to medium). I like everything about it except that now I will also have to wear a moisturizer under it that has an SPF. I am fair and tend to burn easily when out in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma of three

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product since receiving it and I love it. It glides on your face smoothly and leaves no unappealing heavy/caked look. You can feel the moisturizer and my face feels smooth and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Merritt III

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. When i dont feel like putting in full effort on makeup this stuff is perfect. I find i wear it more than my actual makeup.
customer_reviews.author: robert a oneal

customer_reviews.title: sheer tint
customer_reviews.text: Cover is sheer and seems to do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Streaks on face
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and was going to return 1 because this cream is awful! It I greasy and streaks on face. I was going to return 1 untouched and unopened product, but now Amazon is not showing me how to return.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect moisturizer and Cover-up!
customer_reviews.text: Olay CC cream goes on so smooth and is a great moisturizer . The tint is not dark at all, easy to apply and blend. Perfect moisturizer and cover-up in one!
customer_reviews.author: luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: Yellow
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this feels but it does have a much more yellow tone than I wanted. I feel self conscious when wearing it because I'm worried I didn't blend it well enough on my jaw/neck. I also wish it had SPF
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not Lightweight or as Moisturizing as Regular Total Effects!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Olay Total Effects moisturizer for years -- and love it -- but this version with a touch of foundation is very different. It feels like it has no moisturizing qualities at all. I'm extremely disappointed. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love most all of Olay products and this one is excellent for older skin.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day and have for a few years. It feels good on my face abd helps to moisturize,
customer_reviews.author: Crystalfox

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer has the right amount of foundation. I really love the lightness of the product and it leaves my face looking luminous. It does not dirty my clothes the way makeup would and it lasts all day long. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MARIE ARRINDELL

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight coeravage for week days
customer_reviews.text: It covers some flaws and does not feel heavy or like I am made up too much
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Anne Watlington

customer_reviews.title: Not natural looking
customer_reviews.text: This did not look natural on me at all. It did not go on well; it was pretty streaky despite a lot of blending and just didn't look natural. I tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy39Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: Love it all over the face with subtle coverage. I don't like full face make up so this perfect while moisturizing. After I apply this then I spot a med/full coverage foundation over it only on my problematic areas and blend with a professional face brush. Results are airbrushed awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Dark Color
customer_reviews.text: Its more than just a touch of foundation - its dark!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Towles

customer_reviews.title: super moistuizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face cream I have ever used. I used it in the past and moved on to a "better" product. That product is nowhere near as good as Olay and more expensive. Best to moisturize my skin that I have found
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: The perfect hint of color
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this CC cream. It evens out my skin, adds a hint of color and makes my skin look completely natural. And so lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: These must come from an expired bin because it was ...
customer_reviews.text: These must come from an expired bin because it was not smooth and came out lumpy. Plus the fragrance in it made my skin itch. Threw it away after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Maven56

customer_reviews.title: Replaces Foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for daily wear and have stopped using Foundation.It provides a healthy "glow" with light coverage and appears very natural. I still use concealer for under-eye circles. Avoid the neck area since it will come off on collars. I am giving it a 4 because it does not contain sunscreen, so I have to apply Olay Complete All day Moisturizer for skin protection.
customer_reviews.author: C. Winters

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Have It
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about Olay products, except they're a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVED tHIS. iT mAKES mY sKIN SO sOFT. iT FEELS & lOOKS sO gREAT!! Previously I was buying some very EXPENSIVE skin product & honestly it did NOT work as well as the Olay.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: I use in place of make up
customer_reviews.text: I am a simple sort of person. I use a tad of eyeshadow, cover up for undereye shadows that comes in a swab then this product for everything else. I add a swipe of Avon's blush in a tube and I am good to go. Because this is a moisturizer is blends in well and fast/easy. My kind of product.
customer_reviews.author: bascelflt

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: my favorite oil of olay, has foundation already in it and it is lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Blends with face tone to wear all occasions.
customer_reviews.text: Use daily and easy to apply. Blends well with my face tone.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Clary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! I do look younger when I apply it, and it feels luxurious on my skin. Soaks in quickly. Many days, I will only wear this moisturizer, which also makes my dark spots disappear. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: I love it because it stays on all day has sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it stays on all day has sunscreen. I have used this product for 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: Marthie

customer_reviews.title: I hate makeup...
customer_reviews.text: but I LOVE this. It's light, easy to apply evenly, but doesn't leave my face feeling like it's suffocating - or flaking off! It's nice to know that even at my age (early 50s) I can find something that works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Oski

customer_reviews.title: Highly moisterizering and non-greasy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff. I've tried so many moisterizer/foundations. This is the first one I've found that feels nice, non-greasy, and helps my scaly skin.
customer_reviews.author: Yamino

customer_reviews.title: Healthy natural look
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Olays moisturizers touch of foundation for years & absolutely love it. I’ve watched Olay change design etc kept up with it for years 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Moisturizes without being greasy, minimizes pores, has definitely helped my skins sagginess. Great product. Color is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I think this will be a favorite. Feels great and love the way it looks. It makes your skin look soft plus ads some color. I do not like to wear a lot of make up any more. Make up shows more lines. Glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: L Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Color and Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for many days, possibly a month. It takes very little and provides a natural color and cover.
customer_reviews.author: puddles

customer_reviews.title: Love Olay
customer_reviews.text: I’m using that everyday and make my face so soft and moist plus foundation stay on all day I would highly recommend that product
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine1977

product_meta.title: Olay Total Effects Face Moisturizer + Touch of Foundation, 1.7 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Olay Total Effects CC Cream Daily Moisturizer + Touch of Foundation provides instant coverage for vibrant, even-toned skin. Its Color + Correction (CC) cream formula doubles the work as a beauty balm and moisturizer to nourish skin for an instantly visible, healthy-looking radiance. Plus, it’s perfect for daily use. That’s because it provides the right amount of moisturization to visibly improve skin’s texture and help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

BRAND STORY
By Olay
feature_bullets: This CC Cream combines Total Effects anti-aging benefits with just enough foundation to give your skin a flawless-looking glow
Provides natural-looking, sheer coverage and fights 7 signs of aging: dullness, uneven tone, lack of firmness, uneven texture, dryness and visible pores
Gives your skin an instant, healthy-looking radiance
Formula is dermatologically tested and oil-free
One 1.7 fl. oz. bottle - Light To Medium
